summary: Java-based website for an online social media networking service.
architectural_notes: Branding/UI: top header text should be "SpellCastersCCG" styled in green.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and signed-in session handling so users can access authenticated features (profile, posts, friends).
Add user profile creation and editing for each authenticated user, including: display name, bio, profile picture, and cover photo.
Implement viewing other usersâ€™ public profiles and a basic user directory/search to find users to connect with.
Implement friend request workflow: send request, accept/decline request, cancel outgoing request, and display a friends list on user profiles.
Implement a chronological timeline of posts for each user profile, supporting text posts and optional photo attachments; display posts newest-first.
Add a home/feed view that aggregates posts from the signed-in user and their friends in reverse chronological order.

Create a coherent, distinct visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across pages (auth, profile, friends, feed). Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.

Add generated static placeholder assets (default avatar, default cover) and render them in the UI when a user has not uploaded images; store generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Update the top app header branding so the left-side brand element displays green text reading "SpellCastersCCG" instead of the current wordmark image, while keeping it as a link to the root route ("/").

new_feature_requests.summary: User accounts and authentication for the social networking website
User profile creation and customization (profile picture, cover photo, bio)
Friend request workflow and friends list displayed on user profiles
Chronological timeline/feed of user posts and photos
Update the top header to display green text reading "SpellCastersCCG"
